# Set up



Set up packages and path to the data set. 

```{r setupR}
library(rmarkdown)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(Hmisc)
library(here)

## Relative path to the data set
crs_data_path = here("data", "crs.Rdata")
```

## Read data

Load the CRS dataset.

```{r}
load(crs_data_path)
```


## Univariate display of data

```{r}
crs %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = bmi)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_bw()
```
